analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x626a14ec8bb0d92692ef704f19968c20727dede1.sol:
	Contract EesToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x626a14ec8bb0d92692ef704f19968c20727dede1.sol#206-207)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/3/0x626a14ec8bb0d92692ef704f19968c20727dede1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/3/0x626a14ec8bb0d92692ef704f19968c20727dede1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/3/0x626a14ec8bb0d92692ef704f19968c20727dede1.sol#74-75) is not in mixedCase
